description:
You probably think that roadrollers can’t fly, and you are 100% right, but… They can jump, and when they fall… Oh my!  It’s a spectacle!
Imagine throwing 12 tons of metal into a building.  Lots of great locations, and really heavy vehicles are waiting for you to spread the art of destruction!
name: Construction Ramp Jumping
intro: Jump into a roadroller and other heavy vehicles! Spread destruction!
